HomePage.title: Your Modern Music Theory Toolkit
HomePage.subtitle: Unlock the secrets of harmony with Cadenza. A free-to-use suite of interactive tools designed for musicians by musicians to explore, identify, and create music.

ChordNamer.title: Chord Namer
ChordNamer.description: Identify chords on guitar and piano with interactive instruments.

ScaleExplorer.title: Scale Explorer
ScaleExplorer.description: Visualize scales on guitar and piano to master your fretboard and keyboard.

CircleOfFifths.title: Circle of Fifths
CircleOfFifths.description: Explore key signatures and harmonic relationships with an interactive circle.

ScaleFinder.title: Scale Finder
ScaleFinder.description: Find compatible scales for a given chord progression.

ChordNamerPage.title: Chord Namer
ChordNamerPage.subtitle: Click a fret to select a note, or a fret number to create a barre. Only one note can be selected per string.

ScaleExplorerPage.title: Scale Explorer
ScaleExplorerPage.subtitle: Select a root note and a scale to see it on the instrument.

CircleOfFifthsPage.title: Circle of Fifths
CircleOfFifthsPage.subtitle: Explore key signatures and harmonic relationships.

ScaleFinderPage.title: Scale Finder
ScaleFinderPage.subtitle: Select at least two chords to find matching scales.
ScaleFinderPage.resultsPlaceholder: Select at least two chords to see results.
ScaleFinderPage.noResults: No compatible scales found for the selected chords.

ChordInspector.title: Chord Inspector
ChordInspector.description: The identified chord and its structure.
ChordInspector.placeholder: Click on the fretboard to select notes.
ChordInspector.tonesPlaceholder: Select notes to see their intervals.

SavedChords.title: Saved Chords
SavedChords.placeholderDescription: Use the "Save Chord" button to add to your collection.

Footer.githubPrompt: Give me a star or contribute on GitHub
